feed.title: Lloyd Owen
feed.subtitle: A minimal, portfolio, sidebar, bootstrap Jekyll theme with responsive web design and focuses on text presentation.

entry.title: Hello World!
entry.summary: This blog is hopefully going to act as a nice little time capsule for me to look back on in the future. I’m still unsure about the extent of which I’m going to use this and what exactly for but I have some ideas that I’ll go into Notes I have a good habit of getting completely engrossed in a new language, technology, subject, etc, of computer science and then completely forgetting what I’ve l...
